Class.name: Util.Data.EmojiType
Class.Description: Scientific sentiment score rank for unicode symbols http://kt.ijs.si/data/Emoji_sentiment_ranking/

Method.name: LoadCSV
Method.Implementation: if resetTable { do ..%DeleteExtent() } #dim file As %Stream.FileCharacter = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() set file.Filename = fileName while 'file.AtEnd { set line = file.ReadLine(,.status) quit:$$$ISERR(status) set $lb(,,codePoint,,,,,,sentimentScore,unicodeName,unicodeBlock) = $lfs(line, ";") if codePoint="" || (unicodeName="") || (unicodeBlock="") { continue } #dim o As Util.Data.EmojiType = ##class(Util.Data.EmojiType).%New() set o.CodePoint = $zhex($extract(codePoint,3,*)) set o.SentimentScore = sentimentScore set o.UnicodeName = unicodeName set o.UnicodeBlock = unicodeBlock set status = o.%Save() quit:$$$ISERR(status) write o.CodePoint, " ", o.UnicodeChar, " ", o.UnicodeName, " ", o.UnicodeBlock,! }
